targets.expr: max (label_join(avg by (application, cid,env)(avg_over_time(app:app_pod_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{application=~"sls-api.*", env="live",env!~"in|xx", cid!~"xx|in"}[1h])), "container", "-", "application", "env", "cid")) by (container)/ max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace=~"sls.*", container=~"sls-api.*"}) by (container)

max (label_join(avg by (application, cid,env)(avg_over_time(app:app_pod_memory_usage_bytes:sum{application=~"sls-api.*", env="live",env!~"in|xx", cid!~"xx|in"}[1h])), "container", "-", "application", "env", "cid")) by (container)/ max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace=~"sls.*", container=~"sls-api.*"}) by (container)

label_replace(max (label_join(avg by (application, cid,env)(avg_over_time(app:app_pod_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{application=~"sls-api.*", env="live",env!~"in|xx", cid!~"xx|in"}[1h])), "container", "-", "application", "env", "cid")) by (container)/ max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace=~"sls.*", container=~"sls-api.*"}) by (container), "proxy", "$1", "container",".*")

max (label_join(avg by (application, cid,env)(avg_over_time(app:app_pod_memory_usage_bytes:sum{application=~"sls-api.*", env="live",env!~"in|xx", cid!~"xx|in"}[1h])), "container", "-", "application", "env", "cid")) by (container)/ max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace=~"sls.*", container=~"sls-api.*"}) by (container)

max (label_join(avg by (application, cid,env)(avg_over_time(app:app_pod_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{application=~"lls.*livetest.*", env="live",env!~"in|xx", cid!~"xx|in"}[1h])), "container", "-", "application", "env", "cid")) by (container)/ max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace=~"lls.*", container=~"lls.*livetest-live.*"}) by (container)

max (label_join(avg by (application, cid,env)(avg_over_time(app:app_pod_memory_usage_bytes:sum{application=~"lls.*", env="live",env!~"in|xx", cid!~"xx|in"}[1h])), "container", "-", "application", "env", "cid")) by (container)/ max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace=~"lls.*", container=~".*livetest.*"}) by (container)

list.definition: SELECT `project_name` FROM `topology_tab` WHERE `delete_status`=0 AND `biz_project` IN (SELECT `biz_project` FROM `mysql_service_tab` WHERE `delete_status` = 0 and `biz_group` = "$group_id")
list.name: Project
list.query: SELECT `project_name` FROM `topology_tab` WHERE `delete_status`=0 AND `biz_project` IN (SELECT `biz_project` FROM `mysql_service_tab` WHERE `delete_status` = 0 and `biz_group` = "$group_id")

list.definition: SELECT `mysql` FROM `mysql_service_tab` WHERE `delete_status`=0 AND `biz_project` = "$project_id" AND `cid` in ($CID,"Global")
list.name: mysql
list.query: SELECT `mysql` FROM `mysql_service_tab` WHERE `delete_status`=0 AND `biz_project` = "$project_id" AND `cid` in ($CID,"Global")
